author: dblevins
msg: Patch from Ivan Xu, OPENEJB-1309: Make the DependOn sort algorithm stable
Relates to OPENEJB-1296: Allow @DependsOn usage by all session bean types

author: kmalhi
msg: Added Apache license, reformatted with 4 spaces instead of 2, fixed imports

author: kmalhi
msg: Converted the existing test to use the new Validation Test Framework. This test checks for the following keys: "ann.ejb.ejbObject","ann.ejb.ejbLocalObject","ann.ejb.beanClass","ann.ejb.notInterface"

author: koji
msg: SOLR-1960: fix URL for Solr Wiki top page. This is a temporary treatment until INFRA-2251 is solved.

author: kmalhi
msg: Added test to check keys dependsOn.circuit and dependsOn.noSuchEjb. Also fixed logic in CheckDependsOn so that in case of a scenario where one has a dependsOn circuit as well as a Singleton depends on a non-existing ejb, the Validation engine traps both of these scenarios instead of just showing validation failure for a non existent EJB.
